name: The Nights at the Schoolhouse DEMO
name_original: The Nights at the Schoolhouse DEMO
description:
You were hired to work the nightshift as a security guard at Baldi's schoolhouse.

Before starting a night, check out "How to Play" to learn the characters.

Keyboard:

Press ENTER or click the light button to turn the lights on or off, hover your mouse over the red camera button to open or close the camera.

Controller:

Press Y or click the light button to turn the lights on or off, press D-Pad Down or click the red camera button to open or close the camera.
